scenario_text.value: You know, it’s strange.
What’s up?

You see, there was a TV show that used to be
on back when my dad was a kid.
And this place really reminds me of that.

Oh yeah? I can see that, this place has a
real retro feel to it.

Look at this, Miu! Think this’ll help us out
somehow?
What, gimme gimme! Ooo... Nice find!
You take it, Miu! You all can use it together!

Aww, thanks, Shakomon! But is it really okay
for us to just take this?
Why not? It’s not like we know who owns it.
That’s true! Might as well keep it, then!

(Those two sure are close. That time everyone
was fighting feels like ancient history.)

(I hope the others can come to get along as
well as Miu and Shakomon do.)

(Huh, maybe everyone should model themselves
after them?)

(Should I take the chance to ask Miu to play
peacemaker? But how do I convince her?)
(Should I ask Miu to mediate for us?)
Ask her normally.
Humble myself.
Care to mediate?
Hey Miu, I’ve got a favor to ask you.
What?
You and Shakomon are real tight, you know?

I’d like you to use that as an example to
help everyone get along better...
Oh yeah? Does that include Kaito?
Why wouldn’t it?
No way!

Dunno about the others, but it’d just make
him worse. “You’re being tricked!” he’d say.
Now that you mention it... No good, huh?
Um, if I could have a word, Lady Miu.
What?

I would like everyone to be on good terms
like you and Shakomon are...

I humbly request that you appease those of us
that are still quarreling!

You mean like, act as a role model? Hmm,
I wonder if I should?

C’mon, Takuma, don’t go getting her motor
running.

We’re on good terms, sure, but the others are
pretty pissed off.

Nothing we say will get them to change on
a dime and make up all of a sudden.
Yeah, I can see that... Hmm.

I get how all that’s gone down has worn on
everyone’s ability to trust each other.

I just thought there was something we could
do about it.
You’re a nice guy, Takuma.

Still, what happens, happens. It is what it
is.
(...I feel like I just got schooled.)
Thanks for calling me “Lady Miu,” though.
Go on, Takuma, do it again!
...Maybe some other time.
Laaame!

Um... Miu? Would you be interested in
mediating for the others?

Pfft... Ahahaha, are you serious?! No way,
not even a little bit.

Besides, they wouldn’t even listen to me.
I already tried once, and it didn’t help.

I don’t even know if I can explain why
I trust Shakomon as much as I do.
You’re so calm and collected...
That noggin’s not just for show!

Besides, when I get pissed, it’s not like
I want someone to come along and fix it.
That makes sense...

(I guess that means I can only watch over
them for now. It’s a bit irritating...)

Leave this place to me! I’m sure I’ll
scrounge up something real good soon!
(Real good, she says...)

(Well, at least she’s in high spirits.
I better not mess that up.)
